verses.padam: (Padam) pAqkayajñamiti# pAka - yajñam| vai| anviti|̍ AhitAgnErityAhi̍ta̍ - agnEH| paśavaH|̍ upEti|̍ tiśhThantE| iDA̱| Kalu|̍ vai| pAqkayajña iti# pAka - yajñaH| sA| EśhA| antarA| prayAqjAqnUyAqjAniti# prayAja - anUyAqjAn| yajamAnasya|̍ lOkE| avahitEyava̍# - hitAq| tAm| AqhriyamAṇAqmityA̱̍ - hriyamAṇAm|̍ aBIti|̍ mantrayEta| surUpavaṛ̍ śhavarṇa iti surUpa̍ -varq. śhavarṇE| Eti|̍ ihi| iti|̍ paśavaH|̍ vai| iDA̱| paśUn| Eva| upEti|̍ hvayatE| yajñam| vai| dEvAH| aduhrann|̍ yajñaH| asurAn|̍ aduhat| tE| asurAH|̍ yajñadugdhAq̍ iti# yajña - dugdhAqH| parEti|̍ aBavann| yaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ dOha̱m| vidvAn| 1 (50)
verses.samhita: pAqkayajñaM ~MvA anvAhitAgnEH̍ paśava upa# tiśhThanta iDAq Kalu vai pAkayajñaH̍ saiśhA&ntarA prayAjAnUyAqjAn.̍ yajamAnasya̍ lOkE&vahitAq̍ tAmA̱hriyamAṇAmaBi̍ mantrayEta̍ surUpavaṛ̍ śhavarṇa EhIti# paśavO vA iDA# paśUnEvOpa# hvayatE yajñaM ~Mvai dEvA aduhran.̍ yajñO&surAṃ̍ aduhat tE&surA̍ qjñadugdhAqH̍ parA&Bavanq.̍ yO vai yajñasya dOhaM̍ ~MvidvAn - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) yajatE|̍ apIti|̍ anyam| yajamAnam|̍ duhE| sA| mE| satyA| AqśIrityA̱-śIH| asya| yajñasya|̍ BUyAqt| iti|̍ Aqha| EśhaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ dOhaH|̍ tEna|̍ Eva| Enam| duhE| prattA̱| vai| gauH| duhE| prattA̱| iDA̱| yajamAnAya|̍ duhE| EtE| vai| iDAyai|̍ stanA̱H| iDA̱| upahUtEtyupa̍# - hUtAq| iti|̍ vAqyuH| vathsaH| yaṛ hi|̍ hOtA̱| iDA̱m| upahvayatEtyupa̍ - hvayEta|̍ taṛ hi|̍ yajamAnaH|̍ hOtAram|̍ IkśhamAṇaH|̍ vAqyum| manasA|̍ dhyAqyEt| 2 (50)
verses.samhita: yajatE&pyanyaM ~MyajamAnaM̍ duhE sA mE# satyA&&śIrasya yajñasya# BUyAqdityAhaiśha̍ vai yajñasya dOhastEnaivainaM̍ duhE prattAq vai gaurduhE̍ prattEDAq yajamAnAya̍ duha EtE vA iDAyai̍ stanAq iDOpahUtEti̍# vAqyurvathsO yaṛ hi hOtEDAmupahvayE̍ta̍ taṛ hi yajamAnO̍ hOtAramIkśha̍mAṇO̍ vAqyuM manasA̍ dhyAyEn-[ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) mAqtrE| vathsam| upAvasRujatItyu̍pa̍ - avasRujati|̍ sarvEṇa|̍ vai| yajñEna|̍ dEvAH| suvargamiti# suvaH - gam| lOkam| Aqyann| pAqkayajñEnEti# pAka-yajñEna|̍ manuH|̍ aśrAqmyat| sA| iDA̱| manu̱m| upAvartatEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartata|̍ tAm| dEvAqsurA iti# dEva - asurAH| vIti|̍ ahvayanta| pratIcI̱m| dEvAH| parAcIm|̍ asurAH|̍ sA| dEvAn| upAvartatEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartata|̍ paśavaH|̍ vai| tat| dEvAn| avRuṇata| paśavaH|̍ asurAn|̍ ajahuH| yam| kAqmayEta|̍ apaśuH| syAqt| iti|̍ parAcIm|̍ tasya|̍ iDA̱m| upEti|̍ hvayEta| apaśuH| Eva| Bavati| yam| 3 (50)
verses.samhita: mAqtrE vathsa-mupAvasRujati̍ sarvEṇa̍ vai yajñEna# dEvAH suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ pAkayajñEna manuraśrAmyathsEDAq̍ manumupAva̍rtata̍ tAM dEvAsurA̍ vyahvayanta̍ pratIcI̱M dEvAH parAcImasu̍rAqH̍ sA dEvAnupAvartata̍ paśavO vai tad dEvAnavRuṇata̍ paśavO&surAnajahuryaM̍ kAqmayEtApaśuH̍ syAqditi parAcIM̍ tasyEDAqmupa# hvayEtApaśurEva Bavati̍ yaM-[ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) kAqmayEta|̍ paśumAniti# paśu - mAn| syAqt| iti|̍ pratIcI̱m| tasya|̍ iDA̱m| upEti|̍ hvayEta| paśumAniti# paśu - mAn| Eva| Bavati| brahmavAqdina iti# brahma - vAqdinaH|̍ vadanti| saH| tu| vai| iDA̱m| upEti|̍ hvayEta| yaH| iDA̱m| upahUyEtyupa̍ - hUya|̍ AqtmAna̱m| iDAyAm|̍ upahvayEtEtyupa̍ - hvayEta|̍ iti|̍ sA| naH| priyA| supratU̱rtiriti# su - pratU̱rtiH| maGOnI̱| iti|̍ Aqha| iDA̱m| Eva| upahUyEtyupa̍ - hUya|̍ AqtmAna̱m| iDAyAm|̍ upEti|̍ hvayatE| vyastamiti̍ vi-astam| iva| vai| Etat| yajñasya|̍ yat| iDA̱| sAqmi| prAqśnantIti# pra - aśnanti|̍ 4 (50)
verses.samhita: kAqmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAqditi# pratIcIM tasyEDAq-mupa# hvayEta paśumAnEva Bavati̍ brahmavAqdinO# vadanti sa tvA iDAqmupa# hvayEta ya iDA-̍ mupahUyAqtmAna-miDAyA-mupahvayEtEti̍ sA naH̍ priyA supratU̱rtir maGOnItyAqhEDA-mEvOpahUyAq&&tmAna̍ -miDAyAqmupa̍# hvayatE vyastamiva̍ vA Etad-yajñasya yadiDA# sAqmi prAqś~janti# - [ ] 4

verses.padam: (Padam) sAqmi| mAqrjayantE| Etat| pratIti|̍ vai| asurAṇAm|̍ yajñaH| vIti|̍ acCidyata| brahmaṇA|̍ dEvAH| samiti|̍ adadhuH| bRuhaspatiH|̍ tanutAqm| imam| naH| iti|̍ Aqha| brahma|̍ vai| dEvAnA̱m| bRuhaspatiH|̍ brahmaṇA|̍ Eva| yajñam| samiti|̍ dadhAqti| vicCinnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam| yajñam| samiti|̍ imam| dadhAqtu| iti|̍ Aqha| saMtatyAq̍ iti saM - tatyai| viśvE̱| dEvAH| iha| mAqdayantAqm| iti|̍ Aqha| sataMtyEti# saM - tatya|̍ Eva| yajñam| dEvEByaH|̍ anviti|̍ diśati| yAm| vai| 5 (50)
verses.samhita: sAqmi mA̱rjayanta Etat prati vA asurAṇAM̍ ~MyajñO vyacCidyata̍ brahmaṇA̍ dEvAH samadadhur̍ bRuhaspati# -stanutAmimaM na ityAha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAqM bRuhaspatir brahmaṇaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM dadhAti̍ vicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAqtvityA̍ha̍ santatyai̍ viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAqmityA̍ha̍ santatyaiva yajñaM dEvEByO&nu# diśati yAM ~Mvai - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñE| dakśhiṇAm|̍ dadAti|̍ tAm| asya| paśavaH|̍ anu|̍ samiti|̍ krAqmanti| saH| EśhaH| IjAqnaH| apaśuH| BAvukaH|̍ yajamAnEna|̍ Kalu|̍ vai| tat| kAqrya̱m| iti|̍ AqhuH| yathA̱| dEvatrEti# dEva - trA| dattam| kurvIta| Aqtmann| paśUn| ramayEta|̍ iti|̍ braddhna|̍ pinvasva|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| yajñaH| vai| braddhnaH| yajñam| Eva| tat| mahayati| athO iti|̍ dEvatrEti# dEva - trA| Eva| dattam| kurutE| Aqtmann| paśUn| ramayatE| dadataH|̍ mE ( )| mA| kśhAqyi| iti|̍ Aqha| akśhitim|̍ Eva| upEti|̍ Eti| kurvataH| mE| mA| upEti|̍ dasat| iti|̍ Aqha| BUmAna̱m| Eva| upEti|̍ Eti| | 6 (69) (vidvAn-dhyAyEd-Bavati̍ yaM-prAqś^^nanti-yAM ~Mvai-ma-EkAqnna viṃśatiśca̍# )(A1)
verses.samhita: yajñE dakśhiṇAqM̍ dadAti̍ tAmasya̍ paśavO&nu saM krAmanti̍ sa Eśha IjAqnO̍&paśur̍ BAvukO̍ yajamAnEna̍ Kalu vai tatkAqrya-mityA̍hur̍ yathA# dEvatrA dattaM kurvItAtman̍ paśUn ramayEtEti braddhna pinvasvEtyAha̍ yajñO vai braddhnO yajñamEva tanmahayatyathO̍# dEvatraiva dattaM kuruta̍ Aqtman paśUn ramayatE̍ dadatO̍ mE ( ) mA kśhAqyItyAqhAkśhiti-mEvOpai̍ti̍ kurvatO mE mOpa# dasadityAha̍ BUmAnamEvOpai̍ti|̍ | 6 (vidvAn-dhyAyEd-Bavati̍ yaM-prAqś~janti-yAM ~Mvai-ma-EkAqnnaviṃśatiśca̍# ) (A1)

verses.padam: (Padam) saṅśravAq̍ iti saM - śravAqH| ha| sauvarcanasaH| tumi~jjam|̍ aupOditimityaupa̍# - uditim| uvAqca| yat| satriṇA̱m| hOtA̱| aBU̱H| kAm| iDA̱m| upEti|̍ ahvathAqH| iti|̍ tAm| upEti|̍ ahvE| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| yA| prAqṇEnEti# pra - anEna|̍ dEvAn| dAqdhAra|̍ vyAqnEnEti# vi - anEna|̍ manuśhyAn|̍ apAqnEnEtyapa-anEna̍|̍ pitRUn| iti|̍ Cinatti|̍ sA| na| CinattI(3)| iti|̍ Cinatti|̍ iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| śarIram|̍ vai| asyai| tat| upEti|̍ ahvathAqH| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| gauH| vai| 7 (50)
verses.samhita: saṅśravA̍ ha sauvarcanasaH tumi~jjamaupO̍diti-muvAca̍ yathsatriṇAqṃq hOtA&BUH kAmiDAqmupA̱hvathAq iti tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prAqṇEna# dEvAn dAqdhAra# vyAqnEna# manuśhyAnapAqnEna̍# pitRuniti# Cinatti sA na CinattI(3)̍ iti# CinattIti# hOvAca śarIraM̍ ~MvA asyai̍ tadupA̱hvathAq iti# hOvAca gaurvA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) asyai| śarIram|̍ gAm| vAva| tau| tat| parIti|̍ avadatAqm| yA| yajñE| dIyatE̱| sA| prAqṇEnEti# pra - anEna|̍ dEvAn| dAqdhAqra| yayA̱| manuśhyA̱H| jIvanti|̍ sA| vyAqnEnEti# vi - anEna|̍ manuśhyAn|̍ yAm| pitRuBya iti# pitRu - ByaH| Gnanti|̍ sA| apAqnEnEtyapa̍ - anEna|̍ pitRUn| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ paśumAniti# paśu-mAn| Bavati| atha|̍ vai| tAm| upEti|̍ ahvE| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| yA| prajA iti# pra - jAH| praBavantIriti̍# pra - BavantIH|̍ pratIti|̍ AqBavatItyA̱ - Bavati|̍ iti|̍ anna̱m| vai| asyai| tat| 8 (50)
verses.samhita: asyai̍ śarIraM̍ gAM ~MvAva tau tat paryavadatAqM̍ ~MyA yajñE dIyatE sA prAqṇEna# dEvAn dAdhAra̍ yayA# manuśhyA# jIvanti̍ sA vyAqnEna# manuśhyAn# yAM pitRuByO Gnanti sA&pAqnEna# pitRUn. ya EvaM ~MvEda# paśumAn Bavatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prajAH praBavantIH̍ pratyAqBavatItyannaM ~MvA asyai̍ tadu - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) upEti|̍ ahvathAqH| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| OśhadhayaH|̍ vai| asyAqH| anna̱m| OśhadhayaH|̍ vai| prajA iti# pra - jAH| praBavantIriti̍# pra - BavantIH|̍ prati|̍ Eti|̍ Bavanti| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| Bavati| atha|̍ vai| tAm| upEti|̍ ahvE| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| yA| prajA iti# pra - jAH| parAqBavantIriti̍# parA - BavantIH|̍ anugRuhṇAtItyanu̍ - gRuhṇAti|̍ pratIti|̍ AqBavantIrityA̱̍ - BavantIH|̍ gRuhṇAti|̍ iti|̍ pratiśhThAmiti# prati - sthAm| vai| asyai| tat| upEti|̍ ahvathAqH| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| iyam| vai| asyai| pratiśhThEti# prati - sthA| 9 (50)
verses.samhita: pA̱hvathAq iti# hOvAqcauśhadhayO̍ vA asyAq̍ annamOśhadhayO̍ vai prajAH praBavantIH̍ pratyA Bavanti̍ ya EvaM ~MvEdA̱nnAqdO Bavatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yA prajAH parAqBava̍ntI-ranugRuhṇAti̍ pratyAqBavantIr̍ gRuhṇAtIti# pratiśhThAM ~MvA asyai̍ tadupA̱hvathAq iti# hOvAcEyaM ~MvA asyai̍ pratiśhThE - [ ] 9

verses.padam: (Padam) iyam| vai| prajA iti# pra - jAH| parAqBavantIriti̍# parA - BavantIH|̍ anviti#|̍ gRuhṇAqti| pratIti|̍ AqBavantIrityA̱̍ - BavantIH|̍ gRuhṇAqti| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ pratIti|̍ Eva| tiśhThati| atha|̍ vai| tAm| upEti|̍ ahvE| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| yasyai̱| nikramaṇa̍ iti# ni - kramaṇE|̍ GRutam| prajA iti# pra - jAH| sajIMvantIriti̍# saM - jIvantIH|̍ pibanti|̍ iti|̍ Cinatti|̍ sA| na| CinattI(3)| iti|̍ na| Cinatti| iti|̍ ha| uvAqca| prEti|̍ tu| janayati| iti|̍ EśhaH| vai| iDA̱m| upEti|̍ ahvathAqH| iti# ( )| ha| uvAqca| vRuśhTiH|̍ vai| iDA̱| vRuśh^^Tyai̱| vai| nikramaṇa̍ iti# ni - kramaṇE|̍ GRutam| prajA iti# pra - jAH| sajIMvantIriti̍# saM - jIvantIH|̍ pibanti| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ prEti|̍ Eva| jAqyatE| annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| Bavati| | 10 (70) (gaurvA-asyai-tat-pra̍tiśhThA-&hva̍thAq-iti̍-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: yaM ~Mvai prajAH parAqBava̍ntIranu̍# gRuhṇAti pratyAqBavantIr̍ gRuhṇAti ya EvaM ~MvEda pratyEva tiśhThatyatha̍ vai tAmupA̱hva iti# hOvAca yasyai# nikramaṇE̍ GRutaM prajAH sa~jja007A;̍ vantIH̍ pibantIti# Cinatti sA na CinattI̍ (3) iti na CinattIti̍# hOvAca pra tu janayatItyEśha̍ vA iDAqmupA̱hvathAq iti# ( ) hOvAca vRuśhTirq. vA iDAq vRuśhTyai vai nikramaṇE̍ GRutaM prajAH sa~jja007A;̍ vantIH̍ pibanti ya EvaM ~MvEda praiva jAyatE&nnAqdO̍ Bavati|̍ | 10 (gaurvA-asyai̍ tat-pratiśhThA-&hva̍thAq̍ iti-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A2)

verses.padam: (Padam) parOkśhamiti# paraH - akśha̱m| vai| anyE| dEvAH| ijyantE̱| pratyakśhamiti# prati - akśha̱m| anyE| yat| yajatE|̍ yE| Eva| dEvAH| parOkśhamiti# paraH - akśha̱m| ijyantE̱| tAn| Eva| tat| yajati| yat| anvAqhAqryamitya̍nu̍ - AqhAqrya̱m| AqharatItyA̱-harati|̍ EtE| vai| dEvAH| pratyakśhamiti# prati - akśha̱m| yat| brAqhmaṇAH| tAn| Eva| tEna|̍ prIṇAqti| athO iti|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ Eva| asya| EśhA| athO iti|̍ yajñasya|̍ Eva| Cidram| apIti|̍ dadhAqti| yat| vai| yajñasya|̍ krUram| yat| viliśhTamiti̍ vi - liśhTam| tat| anvAqhAqryEṇEtya̍nu̍ - AqhAqryEṇa|̍ 11 (50)
verses.samhita: parOkśhaM ~MvA anyE dEvA ijyantE̱ pratyakśhamanyE̍ yad-yajatE̍ ya Eva dEvAH parOkśhamijyantE̍ tAnEva tad-yajati̍ yadanvAhAqrya̍-mAqhara̍tyEtE̍ vai dEvAH pratyakśhaM ~Myad brA̱hmaṇAstAnEva tEna# prIṇAqtyathO dakśhiṇaivAsyaiśhA&thO̍# yajñasyaiva Cidramapi# dadhAti yadvai yajñasya# krUraM ~MyadviliśhTaM̍ tadanvAhAqryE̍ṇAq̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) anvAharatItya̍nu̍ - Aharati|̍ tat| anvAqhAqryasyEtya̍nu-AqhAqrya̍sya|̍ anvAqhAqryatvamityanvAhArya̍ - tvam| dEvadUtA iti# dEva - dUtAH| vai| EtE| yat| RutvijaH|̍ yat| anvAqhAqryamitya̍nu̍ - AqhAqrya̱m| AqharatItyA̱ - harati|̍ dEvadUtAniti# dEva - dUtAn| Eva| prIṇAqti| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| dEvEByaH|̍ yajñAn| vyAdiśaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|̍ saH| riricAqnaH| amanyata| saH| Etam| anvAqhAqryamitya̍nu̍ - AqhAqrya̱m| aBaktam|̍ apaśyat| tam| Aqtmann| adhatta| saH| vai| EśhaH| prAqjAqpatya iti# prAjA-patyaH| yat| anvAqhAqrya# ityanu̍ - AqhAqryaH|̍ yasya|̍ Evam| viduśhaH|̍ anvAqhAqrya# ityanu̍ - AqhAqryaH|̍ Aqhriyata ityA̱ - hriyatE̱| sAqkśhAditi# sa - akśhAt| Eva| prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim| RuddhnOti| aparimita̍ ityapari̍ - mitaH| nirupya iti# niH-upyaH|̍ aparimita̍ ityapari̍ - mitaH| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEH| 12 (50)
verses.samhita: &nvAharati̍ tadanvAhAqrya̍syA-nvAhAryatvaM̍ dEvadUtA̍ vA EtE yad-RutvijO yadanvAhAqrya̍-mAqhara̍ti̍ dEvadUtAnEva prIṇAti̍ prajApatir̍ dEvEByO# yajñAn vyAdiśath̍ sa riricAqnO̍&manyata̍ sa EtamanvAhAqrya̍-̍ maBakta-mapaśyat̍ tamAqtmannadhattasa̍ vA Eśha prAjApatyO̍ yadanvAhAqryO̍# yasyaivaM ~MviduśhO̱&nvAhAqrya# AhriyatE# sAqkśhAdEva prajApati-mRuddhnOtyapa̍rimitOnirupyO&pa̍rimitaH̍ prajApatiH̍ prajApatE-̍ [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) Aptyai̱| dEvAH| vai| yat| yajñE| akurvata|̍ tat| asurAH|̍ akurvata| tE| dEvAH| Etam| prAqjAqpatyamiti# prAjA - patyam| anvAqhAqryamitya̍nu̍ - AqhAqrya̱m| apaśyann| tam| anvAharantEtya̍nu̍ - Aharanta|̍ tataH|̍ dEvAH| aBavann|̍ parEti|̍ asurAH|̍ yasya|̍ Evam| viduśhaH|̍ anvAqhAqrya# ityanu̍ - AqhAqryaH|̍ Aqhriyata ityA̱ - hriyatE̱| Bavati|̍ AqtmanA̱| parEti|̍ asya| BrAtRuvyaH|̍ Bavati| yajñEna|̍ vai| iśhTI| pakvEna|̍ pUrtI| yasya|̍ Evam| viduśhaH|̍ anvAqhAqrya# ityanu̍ - AqhAqryaH|̍ Aqhriyata ityA̱ - hriyatE̱| saH| tu| Eva| iśhTAqpUrtItI̱śhTa - pUrtI| prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEH| BAqgaH| asi| 13 (50)
verses.samhita: rAptyai# dEvA vai yad-yajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtaM prAjApatya-ma̍nvAhAqrya̍-mapaśyan̍ tamanvAharanta̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parAsurAq̍ yasyaivaM ~MviduśhO̱&nvAhAqrya# AhriyatE BavatyAqtmanAq̍ parA̱sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati yajñEna vA iśhTI pakvEna# pUrtI yasyaivaM ~MviduśhO̱&nvAhAqrya# AhriyatE sa tvEvEśhTA̍pUrtI̍ prajApatErBAqgO̍&sI-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) iti|̍ Aqha| prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim| Eva| BAqgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|̍ samiti|̍ ad^^rdhayati| UrjasvAn|̍ payasvAn|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| Urja̱m| Eva| asminn| payaH|̍ dadhAqti| prAqṇAqpAqnAviti# prAṇa -apAqnau| mE| pAqhi| samAqnavyAqnAviti# samAna - vyAqnau| mE| pAqhi| iti|̍ Aqha| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| Eva| EtAm| Eti|̍ śAqstE| akśhitaH|̍ asi| akśhityai|̍ tvAq| mA| mE| kśhEśhThAqH| amutra|̍ amuśhminn|̍ lOkE| iti|̍ Aqha| kśhIyatE|̍ vai| amuśhminn|̍ lOkE| anna̱m| itaH pradAnamitItaH̍ - pradAqnam| hi| amuśhminn|̍ lOkE ( )| prajA iti# pra - jAH| upajIvantItyupa̍ - jIvanti|̍ yat| Evam| aBimRuśatItyaBi̍ - mRuśati|̍ akśhitim|̍ Eva| Enat| gamayati| na| asya| amuśhminn|̍ lOkE| anna̱m| kśhIyatE| | 14 (65)
verses.samhita: tyAha̍ prajApatimEva̍ BAgadhEyE̍na̍ samarddhayatyUrja̍svAqn̍ payasvAqnityAqhOrja̍-mEvAsmin̍ payO# dadhAti prAṇApAqnau mE# pAhi samAnavyAqnau mE# pAqhItyAhAq&&śiśha̍mEvaitAmA̍ śAqstE &kśhitO̍ &syakśhityai̍ tvAq mA mE̱ kśhEśhThA amutrAqmuśhmin̍ ~MlOka ityAha̍ kśhIyatE̍ vA amuśhmin̍ ~MlOkE&nna-̍ mitaHpradAnaṅq̍ hyamuśhmin̍ ~MlOkE ( ) prajA upajIva̍nti̍ yadEva-maBimRuśatyakśhi̍ti-mEvaina̍d̍ gamayati nAsyAqmuśhmin̍ ~MlOkE&nnaM̍ kśhIyatE| | 14

verses.padam: (Padam) barq. hiśhaH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| prajAvAqniti# prajA -vAqn| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| bara. hiśhA̱| vai| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| prajA iti# pra - jAH| asRujata| tEna|̍ Eva| prajA iti# pra - jAH| sRujatE| narAqśaṃsasya|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| paśumAniti# paśu-mAn| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| narAqśaṃsEna|̍ vai| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| paśUn| asRujata| tEna|̍ Eva| paśUn| sRujatE| agnEH| sviśhTakRuta iti# sviśhTa - kRutaH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| AyuśhmAn|̍ yajñEna|̍ pratiśhThAmiti# prati-sthAm| gamEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| AyuH|̍ Eva| Aqtmann| dhattE| pratIti|̍ yajñEna|̍ tiśhThati| dara. śapUrṇamAqsayOriti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsayO̱H| 15 (50)
verses.samhita: barq. hiśhO&haM dEvayajyayA̱̍ prajAvA̱n BUyAsamityAha̍ barq. hiśhAq vai prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata̍ tEnaiva prajAH sRujatE̍ narAqśaṃsasyAqhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśumAn BUyAsamityA̍ha̍ narAqśaṃsEna̍ vai prajApatiH̍ paśUnasRujata̍ tEnaiva paśUnth sRujatE&gnEH̍ sviśhTakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA&&yu̍śhmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiśhThAM gamEyamityAqhA&&yu̍rEvAtman̍ dhattE̍ prati# yajñEna# tiśhThati daṛ śapUrṇamAqsayOr - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) vai| dEvAH| ujjitimityut̍ - jitim| anu|̍ uditi|̍ ajayann| darq. śapUrṇamAqsAByAqmiti# daṛ śa-pUrṇamAqsAByA̱m| asurAn|̍ apEti|̍ anudanta| agnEH| aham| ujjitimityut̍ - jitim| anu|̍ uditi|̍ jEśham| iti|̍ Aqha| darq. śapUrṇamAqsayOriti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsayO̱H| Eva| dEvatAnAm|̍ yajamAnaH|̍ ujjitimityut̍ - jitim| anu|̍ uditi|̍ jayati| dara. śapUrṇamAqsAByAqmiti# daṛ śa-pUrṇamAqsAByA̱m| BrAtRuvyAn|̍ apEti|̍ nudatE| vAjavatIByAqmiti̍ vAja# - vatIByAqm| vIti|̍ Uhati| anna̱m| vai| vAjaH|̍ anna̱m| Eva| avEti|̍ rundhE| dvAByA̱m| pratiśhThityAq̍ iti prati# - sthityai| yaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ dvau| dOhau̱| vidvAn| yajatE|̍ uBayataH|̍ 16 (50)
verses.samhita: vai dEvA ujjiti-manUda̍jayan̍ daṛ śapUrṇamAqsAByAq- masurAqnapA̍-nudantAqgnE-rahamujji̍ti-manUjjE̍śha-̍ mityAha̍ daṛ śapUrṇamAqsayOrEva̍ dEvatAnAqM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ ujjitimanUjja̍yati̍ daṛ śapUrṇamAqsAByAqM BrAtRuvyAqnapa̍# nudatE vAjavatIByAqM̍ ~MvyUhatyannaM̍ ~Mvai vAjO&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE dvAByAqM pratiśhThityai̍ yO vai yajñasya dvau dOhau# vidvAn yajata̍ uBayata# - [ ] 16

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva| yajñam| duhE| purastA̱t| ca| upariśhTAt|̍ ca| EśhaH| vai| anyaH| yajñasya|̍ dOhaH|̍ iDAyAm|̍ anyaH| yaṛ hi|̍ hOtA̱| yajamAnasya|̍ nAma|̍ gRuhṇIyAt| taṛ hi|̍ brUyAqt| Eti|̍ imAH| agmann| Aqśiśha ityA̱ - śiśhaH|̍ dOhakAmAq̍ iti dOha# - kAqmAqH| iti|̍ saṅstutAq̍ iti saM - stutAqH| Eva| dEvatA̱H| duhE| athO iti|̍ uBayataH|̍ Eva| yajñam| duhE| purastA̱t| ca| upariśhThat|̍ ca| rOhitEna|̍ tvAq| agniH| dEvatA̱m| gamayatu| iti|̍ Aqha| EtE| vai| dEvAqśvA iti# dEva - aśvAH| 17 (50)
verses.samhita: Eva yajñaM duhE̍ purastA̱ccOpariśhTAccaiśha̍ vA anyO yajñasya dOha iDAyAmanyO̍ yaṛ hi hOtAq yajamAnasya̍ nAma# gRuhṇIyAt taṛ hi# brUyAqdEmA agmannAqśiśhO̍ dOhakAmAq̍ iti saṅstutA̍ Eva dEvatA# duhE&thO# uBayata# Eva yajñaM duhE̍ purastA̱ccOpariśhTAcca̍ rOhitEna̍ tvAq&gnirdEvatA̱M gamayatvityAhaitE̍ vai dEvAqśvA̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) yajamAnaH|̍ prastara iti# pra - staraH| yat| EtaiH| prastaramiti# pra - staram| praharatIti# pra - harati|̍ dEvAqśvairiti# dEva - aśvaiH| Eva| yajamAnam|̍ suvargamiti# suvaH - gam| lOkam| gamayati| vIti|̍ tE| mu~jcAqmi| raśanAH| vIti|̍ raśmIn| iti|̍ Aqha| EśhaH| vai| agnEH| vimOka iti# vi - mOkaH| tEna|̍ Eva| Enam| vIti|̍ mu~jcati| viśhṇO̱H| śaM~MyOriti# śaM - yOH| aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| yajñEna|̍ pratiśhThAmiti# prati - sthAm| gamEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| yajñaH| vai| viśhṇuH|̍ yajñE| Eva| antataH| pratIti|̍ tiśhThati| sOmasya|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| surEtAq iti# su - rEtA̱H| 18 (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnaH̍ prastarO yadEtaiH prastaraM̍ praharati̍ dEvAqśvairEva yajamAnaṃ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ vi tE# mu~jcAmi raśanA vi raśmInityAhaiśha̍ vA agnErvimOkastE-naivainaM̍ ~Mvimu~jcati̍ qviśhṇO̱H śaM~MyOrahaM dEvayajyayA̍# yajñEna# pratiśhThAM gamEyamityA̍ha̍ yajñO vai viśhṇur̍ yajña EvAntataH prati# tiśhThati sOmasyAqhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# surEtAq -[ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) rEtaH|̍ dhiśhIya| iti|̍ Aqha| sOmaH|̍ vai| rEtOdhA iti# rEtaH-dhAH| tEna|̍ Eva| rEtaH|̍ Aqtmann| dhattE| tvaśhTuH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| paśUnAm| rUpam| puśhEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| tvaśhTA̱| vai| paśUnAm| mithunAnA̱m| rUpakRuditi# rUpa - kRut| tEna|̍ Eva| paśUnAm| rUpam| Aqtmann| dhattE| dEvAnA̱m| patnI̱H| agniH| gRuhapatiriti̍# gRuha - patiH| yajñasya|̍ mithunam| tayO̱H| aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| mithunEna|̍ prEti|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| EtasmA̱t| vai| mithunAt| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| mithunEna|̍ 19 (50)
verses.samhita: rEtO# dhiśhIyEtyAha̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhAstEnaiva̍ rEta# Aqtman dhattE̍ tvaśhTurahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśUnAṃ rUpaM puśhEyamityA̍ha̍ tvaśhTAq vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRuttEnaiva paśUnAṃ̍ rUpamAqtman dhattE̍ dEvAnAqM patnIragnir̍ gRuhapatir̍ yajñasya# mithunaM tayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# mithunEna praBUyAsa-mityA̍haitasmAqd̍ vai mithunAt̍ prajApatir̍ mithunEna - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|̍ ajAqyata| tasmA̱t| Eva| yajamAnaH|̍ mithunEna|̍ prEti|̍ jAqyatE| vEdaH| asi| vittiH|̍ asi| vidEya|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| vEdEna|̍ vai| dEvAH| asurAṇAm|̍ vittam| vEdya̱m| avindanta| tat| vEdasya|̍ vEdatvamiti# vEda - tvam| yadyaditi yat - yat| BrAtRuvyasya|̍ aBiddhyAyEdityaBi-dhyAyE̱t|̍ tasya|̍ nAma|̍ gRuhṇIyAqt| tat| Eva| asya| sarva̱m| vRu~gktE| GRutavantamiti̍# GRuta - vantam| kulAqyina̱m| rAqyaH| pOśha̱m| sahasriṇa̱m| vEdaH| dadAqtu| vAqjina̱m| iti|̍ Aqha| prEti|̍ sahasra̱m| paśUn| AqpnOti ( )| Eti|̍ asya| prajAyAqmiti# pra - jAyA̱m| vAqjI| jAqyatE| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ | 20 (58)
verses.samhita: prAjAyata̍ tasmAdEva̍ yajamAnO̍ mithunEna prajAyatE̍ vEdO&si̍ vittirasi̍ vidEyEtyAha̍ vEdEna vai dEvA asurAṇAM̍ ~MvittaM ~MvEdyamavindanta̍ tad-vEdasya# vEdatvaM ~Myadyad BrAtRuvyasyABiddhyAyEt̍ tasya nAma# gRuhṇIyAqt tadEvAsya sarvaM̍ ~MvRu~gktE GRutavantaM̍ kulAqyinaṃ# rAqyaspOśhaṃ# sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvEdO dadAtu̍ vAqjinamityAha̍ prasahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOtyA ( ) sya# prajAyA̱M ~MvAqjI jAyatE̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | 20

verses.padam: (Padam) dhruvAm| vai| ricyamAnAm|̍ yajñaH| anviti|̍ ricyatE| yajñam| yajamAnaH|̍ yajamAnam|̍ prajA iti# pra - jAH| dhruvAm| AqpyAyamAnAqmityA̱̍ - pyAyamAnAm|̍ yajñaH| anu|̍ Eti|̍ pyAqyatE| yajñam| yajamAnaH|̍ yajamAnam|̍ prajA iti# pra - jAH| Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| dhruvA| GRutEna|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| dhruvAm| Eva| Eti|̍ pyAqyayati| tAm| AqpyAyamAnAqmityA̱̍ - pyAyamAnAm|̍ yajñaH| anu|̍ Eti|̍ pyAqyatE| yajñam| yajamAnaH|̍ yajamAnam|̍ prajA iti# pra - jAH| prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEH| viBAniti# vi - BAn| nAma|̍ lOkaH| tasminn|̍ tvAq| dadhAqmi| saha| yajamAnEna|̍ iti|̍ 21 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvAM ~Mvai ricyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nu# ricyatE yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajA dhruvAmAqpyAyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nvA pyAyatE̍ yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajA A pyAyatAM̍ dhruvA GRutEnEtyAha̍ dhruvAmEvA && pyAyayati̍ tAmAqpyAyamAnAM̍ ~MyajñO&nvA pyAyatE̍ yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajAH prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmiṅstvA̍ dadhAmi saha yajamAnEnEtyA̍# - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) Aqha| ayam| vai| prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEH| viBAniti# vi - BAn| nAma|̍ lOkaH| tasminn|̍ Eva| Enam| dadhAqti| saha| yajamAnEna|̍ ricyatE|̍ iva| vai| Etat| yat| yajatE|̍ yat| yajamAqnaBAqgamiti# yajamAna - BAqgam| prAqśnAtIti# pra - aśnAti|̍ AqtmAna̱m| Eva| prIṇAqti| EtAvAn|̍ vai| yajñaH| yAvAn|̍ yajamAqnaBAqga iti# yajamAna - BAqgaH| yajñaH| yajamAnaH|̍ yat| yajamAqnaBAqgamiti# yajamAna - BAqgam| prAqśnAtIti# pra - aśnAti|̍ yajñE| Eva| yajñam| pratIti|̍ sthAqpayati| Etat| vai| sUyavasamiti̍# su - yavasam|̍ sOdakamiti̍ sa - udakam| yat| barq. hiH| ca| ApaH|̍ ca| Etat| 22 (50)
verses.samhita: hAqyaM ~Mvai prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmi-nnEvaina̍M̍ dadhAti saha yajamAnEna̍ ricyata̍ iva vA Etad-yad-yajatE̍ yad-yajamAnaBAqgaM̍ prAqś~jAtyAqtmAnamEva̍ prIṇAtyEtAvAqnq.̍ vai yajñO yAvAn.̍ yajamAnaBAqgO yajñO yajamAnO̍ yad-yajamAnaBAqgaM̍ prAqś~jAti# yajña Eva yajñaM prati# śhThApayatyEtadvai sUyavasaṃq̍ sOdakaM̍ yadbarq. hiścA&&paścaitad̍ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) yajamAnasya|̍ AqyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|̍ yat| vEdiH|̍ yat| pUrṇapAqtramiti# pUrṇa - pAqtram| antarvEdItyantaH̍ - vEdi| ninayatIti# ni - nayati|̍ svE| Eva| Aqyatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|̍ sUyavasamiti̍# su - yavasam|̍ sOdakamiti̍ sa - udakam| kurutE| sat| asi| sat| mE| BUyAqH| iti|̍ Aqha| ApaH|̍ vai| yajñaH| ApaH|̍ amRuta̱m| yajñam| Eva| amRuta̱m| Aqtmann| dhattE| sarvAṇi|̍ vai| BUtAni|̍ vratam| upayantamityupa̍ - yanta̱m| anu|̍ upEti|̍ yanti| prAcyA̱m| diśi| dEvAH| RutvijaH|̍ mAqrjayantAqm| iti|̍ Aqha| EśhaH| vai| darq. śapUrṇamAqsayOriti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsayO̱H| avaBRutha ityava̍ - BRuthaH| 23 (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnasyAq&&yata̍naM̍ ~MyadvEdiryat pU̱rṇapAqtra-mantarvEdi̍ ninayati̍ sva EvA&&yatanE̍ sUyavasaṃq̍ sOdakaM̍ kurutE sadasi̍ sanmE# BUyAq ityAqhA&&pO vai yajña ApO&mRutaM̍ ~MyajñamEvAmRuta-mAqtman̍ dhattE̍ sarvAṇi̍ vai BUtAni# vrata-mupayanta̍ -manUpa# yanti prAcyA̱M diśi dEvA RutvijO# mArjayantAq-mityAhaiśha̍ vai daṛ̍ śapUrṇamAqsayO-ravaBRuthO̍ -[ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) yAni|̍ Eva| Enam| BUtAni|̍ vratam| upayantamityupa̍ - yanta̱m| anUpayantItyanu̍ - upayanti|̍ taiH| Eva| saha| avaBRuthamityava̍ - BRutham| avEti|̍ Eti| viśhṇumuKAq̍ iti viśhṇu# - muKAqH| vai| dEvAH| CandOBiriti̍ CandaH̍ - BiH| imAn| lOkAn| anapajayyamityanapa-jayyam|̍ aBIti|̍ ajayann| yat| viśhṇukramAniti# viśhṇu - kramAn| kramatE|̍ viśhṇuH|̍ Eva| BUtvA| yajamAnaH|̍ CandOBiriti̍ CandaH̍ - BiH| imAn| lOkAn| anapajayyamityanapa̍ - jayyam| aBIti|̍ jayati| viśhṇO̱H| kramaH|̍ asi| aBimAqtihEtyaBimAti̍ - hA| iti|̍ Aqha| gAqyatrI| vai| pRuthivI| traiśhTuBam|̍ antarikśham|̍ jAgatI|̍ dyauH| AnuśhTuBIrityAnu̍# - sthuBIH| diśaH̍ ( )| CandOBiriti̍ CandaH̍ - BiH| Eva| imAn| lOkAn| yathAqpUrvamiti# yathA - pUrvam| aBIti|̍ jayati| | 24 (57)
verses.samhita: yAnyEvainaM̍ BUtAni# vratamupayanta̍-manUpayanti̍ tairEva sahAvaBRuthamavai̍ti̍ viśhṇumuKAq̍ vai dEvA śCandOBirimAn̍ ~MlOkA-nanapajayyamaBya̍jayanq.̍ yad-viśhṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ viśhṇurEva̍ BUtvA yajamAnaśCandO̍BirimAn̍ ~MlOkA-nanapajayyamaBi̍ jayati̍ viśhṇOH kramO̱&syaBimAtihEtyAha̍ gAyatrI vai pRuthivI̍ traiśhTuBamantari̍kśhaM̍ jAgatI̍ dyaurAnuśhTuBIr̍ diśa śCandOBirEvEmAn̍ ~MlOkAn. yathApUrvamaBi̍ jayati|̍ | 24

verses.padam: (Padam) aganma|̍ suvaH|̍ suvaH|̍ aganma| iti|̍ Aqha| suvargamiti# suvaH - gam| Eva| lOkam| Eti| sadRuMśa iti# saM -dRuśaH|̍ tE| mA| Cithsi| yat| tE| tapaH|̍ tasmai̱| tE| mA| Eti|̍ vRukśhi| iti|̍ Aqha| yathAqyajuriti# yathA - yajuH| Eva| Etat| suBUriti# su- BUH| asi| śrEśhThaH|̍ raśmInAm| Aqyud^^rdhA ityAyuH̍ - dhAH| asi| AyuH|̍ mE| dhEhi| iti|̍ Aqha| AqśiśhamityA̱-śiśha̱m| Eva| EtAm| Eti|̍ śAqstE| prEti|̍ vai| EśhaH| asmAt| lOkAt| cyavatE| yaH| 25 (50)
verses.samhita: aganma̍ suvaH suvaraganmEtyA̍ha̍ suvargamEva lOkamEti̍ sandRuśastE̍ mA Cithsi̍ yattE tapastasmai# tE mA && vRukśhItyAha̍ yathAyaju-rEvaitath suBUrasi̍ śrEśhThO# raśmInAmAyurddhA̍ asyAyurmE̍ dhEhItyAhAq&&śiśha̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE pra vA EśhO̱&smAn ~MlOkAccyavatE̍ yO - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) viśhṇukramAniti# viśhṇu - kramAn| kramatE|̍ suvargAyEti# suvaH-gAya|̍ hi| lOkAya|̍ viśhṇukramA iti# viśhṇu - kramAH| kramyantE̱| brahmavAqdina iti# brahma - vAqdinaH|̍ vadanti| saH| tu| vai| viśhṇukramAniti# viśhṇu - kramAn| kramEta| yaH| imAn| lOkAn| BrAtRuvyasya|̍ sam~MvidyEti# saM - vidya|̍ punaH|̍ imam| lOkam| pratyavarOhEditi# prati - avarOhE̱t| iti|̍ EśhaH| vai| asya| lOkasya|̍ pratyavarOha iti# prati - avarOhaH| yat| Aha|̍ idam| aham| amum| BrAtRuvyam|̍ AqByaH| digBya iti# dik - ByaH| asyai| divaH| iti|̍ imAn| Eva| lOkAn| BrAtRuvyasya|̍ sam~MvidyEti# saM - vidya|̍ punaH|̍ imam| lOkam| pratyavarOhatIti̍# prati - avarOhati|̍ samiti|̍ 26 (50)
verses.samhita: viśhṇukramAn̍ kramatE̍ suvargAya hi lOkAya# viśhṇukramAH kramyantE̱ brahmavAqdinO# vadanti sa tvai viśhṇukramAn̍ kramEta̍ ya imAn ~MlOkAn BrAtRuvyasya̍ saM~Mvidya punarimaM̍ ~MlOkaM pratyavarOhEdityEśha̍ vA asya lOkasya# pratyavarOhO yadAhEdamahamamuM BrAtRuvyamAqByO̍ digByO̱&syai diva itImAnEva lOkAn BrAtRuvyasya̍ saM~Mvidya punarimaM̍ ~MlOkaM pratyavarOhati̍ saM - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) jyOtiśhA|̍ aBUvam| iti|̍ Aqha| asminn| Eva| lOkE| pratIti|̍ tiśhThati| aindrIm| AqvRutamityA̱ - vRuta̱m| anvAvarta̍ ityanu̍ - AvartE|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| asau| vai| AqdityaH| indraH|̍ tasya|̍ Eva| AqvRutamityA̱ - vRuta̱m| anviti|̍ paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|̍ dakśhiṇA| paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|̍ svam| Eva| vIrya̱m| anviti|̍ paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|̍ tasmA̱t| dakśhiṇaH|̍ ad^^rdhaH|̍ AqtmanaH|̍ vIryAvattara̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - taraH| athO iti|̍ Aqdityasya|̍ Eva| AqvRutamityA̱ - vRuta̱m| anviti|̍ paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|̍ samiti|̍ aham| prajayEti# pra - jayA̱| samiti|̍ mayA̱| prajEti# pra - jA| iti|̍ Aqha| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| 27 (50)
verses.samhita: jyOtiśhA&BUvamityA̍hAqsminnEva̍ lOkE prati# tiśhThatyaindrI-mAqvRuta-manvAva̍rta̍ ityAhAqsau̍ vA Aditya̍ indrastasyaivA&&vRutamanu# paryAvartatE̍ dakśhiṇA paryAvartatE̍ svamEva vIryamanu̍# paryAvartatE̍ tasmAqd dakśhiṇO&rddha# AqtmanO# vIryAvattarO&thO̍# AdityasyaivA&&vRutamanu# paryAvartatE̍ samahaM prajayAq saM mayA̱ prajEtyAhAq&&śiśha̍# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva| EtAm| Eti|̍ śAqstE| samiddha̍ iti saM - iddhaH| agnE| mE| dIdihi| samEddhEti# saM - EddhA| tE| agnE| dIdyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| yathAqyajuriti# yathA - yajuH| Eva| Etat| vasumAqniti̍ vasu# - mAqn| yajñaH| vasIyAn|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| AqśiśhamityA̱-śiśha̱m| Eva| EtAm| Eti|̍ śAqstE| bahu| vai| gAṛ hapatyasyEti̍ gAṛ ha# - patyasya| antE̱| miśram| iva| caryatE| AqgnipAqvamAqnIByAqmityA̱gni - pAqvamAqnIByA̱m| gAṛ hapatyamiti̍ gAṛ ha# - patyam| upEti|̍ tiśhThatE| punAti|̍ Eva| agnim| punItE| AqtmAna̱m| dvAByA̱m| pratiśhThityAq̍ iti prati# - sthityai| agnE̱| gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE| iti|̍ Aqha| 28 (50)
verses.samhita: mEvaitAmA śA̱stE samiddhO̍ agnE mE dIdihi samEddhA tE# agnE dIdyAsamityAha̍ yathAyaju-rEvaitadvasumAn.̍ yajñO vasIyAn̍ BUyAsa-mityAhAq-&&śiśha̍mEvEtAmA̍ śA̱stE bahu vai gAṛ hapatyasyAntE̍# miśramiva̍ caryata AgnipAvamAqnIByAqM gAṛ hapatyamupa̍# tiśhThatE punAtyEvAgniM punIta̍ AqtmAnaM dvAByAqM pratiśhThityAq̍ agnE# gRuhapata ityAha̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: (Padam) yathAqyajuriti# yathA - yajuH| Eva| Etat| śatam| himA̱H| iti|̍ Aqha| śatam| tvAq| hEmantAn| indhiśhIya| iti|̍ vAva| Etat| Aqha| putrasya|̍ nAma|̍ gRuhṇAqti| annAqdamityanna̍ - adam| Eva| Enam| karOti| tAm| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| Eti|̍ śAqsE| tantavE|̍ jyOtiśhmatIm|̍ iti|̍ brUyAqt| yasya|̍ putraH| ajAtaH|̍ syAt| tEjasvI| Eva| asya| brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI| putraH| jAqyatE| tAm| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| Eti|̍ śAqsE| amuśhmai̱| jyOtiśhmatIm|̍ iti|̍ brUyAqt| yasya|̍ putraH| 29 (50)
verses.samhita: yathAyajurEvaitacCataṃ himAq ityAha̍ śataM tvA# hEmantAnindhiśhIyEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ putrasya nAma# gRuhṇAtyannAqdamEvainaM̍ karOti tAmAqśiśhamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiśhmatImiti̍# brUyAqd-yasya# putrO&jAtaH̍ syAt tEjasvyE̍vAsya̍# brahmavarcasI putrO jAyatE̍ tAmAqśiśhamA śAsE&muśhmai̍ jyOtiśhmatImiti̍# brUyAqd-yasya# putrO - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) jAqtaH| syAt| tEjaH|̍ Eva| asminn| brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam| dadhAqti| yaH| vai| yajñam| prayujyEti# pra-yujya|̍ na| vimu~jcatIti# vi - mu~jcati|̍ apratiśhThAqna ityaprati̍ - sthAqnaH| vai| saH| Bavati| kaH| tvAq| yunakti| saH| tvAq| vIti|̍ mu~jcatu| iti|̍ Aqha| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| vai| kaH| prajApatinEti̍# prajA - patinAq| Eva| Enam| yunakti|̍ prajApatinEti̍# prajA - patinAq| vIti|̍ mu~jcati| pratiśhThityAq̍ iti prati# - sthityai| Iśvaram| vai| vratam| avisRuśhTamityavi̍# - sRuśhTam| pradaha iti# pra - dahaH|̍ agnE̱| vratapata iti# vrata - patE| vratam| acAqriśham| iti|̍ Aqha| vratam| Eva| 30 (50)
verses.samhita: jAqtaH syAttEja# EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ yO vai yajñaM prayujya na vimu~jcatya̍pratiśhThAqnO̍ vai sa Bavati̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvAq vi mu~jcatvityA̍ha̍ prajApatir̍ vai kaH prajApatinaivaina̍M̍ ~Myunakti# prajApatinAq̍ vi mu~jcati̍ pratiśhThityA̍ IśvaraM ~Mvai vratamavisRuśhTaM̍ pradahO&gnE̱ vratapatE vratamacAriśhamityA̍ha̍ vratamEva-[ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) vIti|̍ sRujatE| śAntyai̱| apradAhAqyEtyapra̍# - dAqhAqya| parA~g|̍ vAva| yajñaH| Eti| na| nIti|̍ vartatE| punaH|̍ yaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ punarAqlaBaMmiti# punaH - AqlaBaMm| vidvAn| yajatE|̍ tam| aBi| nIti|̍ vartatE| yajñaH| baBUva| saH| Eti|̍ baBUva| iti|̍ Aqha| EśhaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ punarAqlaBaM iti# punaH-AqlaBaMH| tEna|̍ Eva| Enam| punaH|̍ Eti|̍ laBatE| anavaruddhEtyana̍va̍ - ruddhAq| vai| Etasya|̍ virADiti# vi - rAT| yaH| AhitAgnirityAhi̍ta-agniH|̍ sann| asaBaH| paśavaH|̍ Kalu|̍ vai ( )| brAqhmaṇasya|̍ saBA| iśhTvA| prA~g| utkramyEtyut̍ - kramya|̍ brUyAqt| gOmAqniti gO - mAqn| agnE| avimAqnityavi̍# - mAqn| aśvI| yajñaH| iti|̍ avEti|̍ saBAm| rundhE| prEti|̍ sahasra̱m| paśUn| AqpnOti| Eti|̍ asya| prajAyAqmiti# pra - jAyA̱m| vAqjI| jAqyatE| | 31 (74) (yaH-sa-mAqsiśhaM-gRuhapata-ityA̍hAq-&muśhmai̍ jyOtiśhmatImiti̍# brUyAqd-yasya# putrO-vratamEva-Kalu-vai-caturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: vi sRujatE̍ śAntyAq apradAhAya̍ parAq~ga. vAva yajña Eti̍ na ni vartatE̍ punaryO vai yajñasya# punarAlaMBaM ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ tamaBi ni vartatE̍ yajñO baBUva̍ sa A baBUvEtyA̍haiśha̍ vai yajñasya# punarAlaMBa-stEnaivainaM punarA laBatE&na̍varuddhAq̍ vA Etasya# virAD ya AhitAgniH̍ sannasaBaH̍ paśavaH Kalu vai ( ) brA̱hmaṇasya# saBEśhTvA prA~gutkramya# brUyAqd gOmAṃ# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajña ityava# saBAṃ rundhE pra sahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOtyA&sya# prajAyA̱M ~MvAqjI jAyatE|̍ | 31 (yaH-sa-mAqsiśhaM-gRuhapata-ityA̍hAq-muśhmai̍ jyOtiśhmatImiti̍# brUyAqd yasyaputrO-vratamEva-Kalu̍ vai- caturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)

verses.padam: (Padam) dEva|̍ savitaH| prEti|̍ suva| yajñam| prEti|̍ suva| yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| BagAya|̍ divyaH| gandharvaH| | kEtapUriti# kEta - pUH| kEta̱m| naH| punAqtu| vAqcaH| patiH|̍ vAca̱m| adya| svadAqti| naH| | indrasya|̍ vajraH|̍ asi| vArtraGna̍ iti vArtra# - GnaH| tvayA̱| ayam| vRutram| vaddhyAqt| | vAjasya|̍ nu| prasava iti# pra - savE| mAqtara̱m| mahIm| aditim|̍ nAma|̍ vacasA|̍ karAqmahE| | yasyA̱m| idam| viśva̱m| Buvanam|̍ AqvivEśEtyA̱ - vivEśa|̍ tasyA̱m| naH| dEvaH| savitA| dharma|̍ sAqviśhat| | aPsvityap̍ - su| 32 (50)
verses.samhita: dEva# savitaH pra suva̍ yajñaM pra suva̍ yajñapatiM̍ BagAya̍ divyO gandharvaH|̍ kEtapUH kEtaM̍ naH punAtu vAqcaspatir vAcamadya̍ svadAti̍ naH| | indrasya̍ vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastvayAq&yaM̍ ~MvRutraM ~MvaddhyAt|̍ | vAjasya̍ nu prasavE̍ mAqtaraM̍ mahImaditiM̍ nAma vacasA̍ karAmahE| yasyAmidaM̍ ~MviśvaM Buvana-mAvivEśa̍ tasyA̱M nO dEvaH savitA̍ dharma# sAviśhat| | aPsva-[̍ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) antaH| amRuta̱m| aPsvityap̍ - su| BEśhajam| apAm| uta| praśastiśhviti̍ pra - śastiśhu| aśvA̱H| Bavatha| vAqjinaH| | vAqyuH| vAq| tvAq| manuH|̍ vAq| tvAq| gandharvAH| saptaviṃśatiriti̍# sapta - viṃqśatiH| | tE| agrE̱| aśva̱m| Aqyu~jjann| tE| asminn| javam| Eti|̍ adadhuH| | apA̱m| napAqt| AqśuhEmannityAśu̍ - hEman| yaH| UrmiH| kakudmAqniti# kakut - mAqn| pratU̱rtiriti pra - tUrtiH| vAqjasAtama̍ iti# vAja - sAtamaH|̍ tEna|̍ ayam| vAja̱m| sEt| | viśhṇO̱H| kramaH|̍ asi| viśhṇO̱H| krAqntam| asi| viśhṇO̱H| vikrA̱ntamiti vi - krAqntam| asi| a~gkau| nya~gkAviti# ni - a~gkau ( )| aBitaH|̍ ratha̱m| yau| dhvAqntam| vAqtAqgramiti# vAta - agram| anviti|̍ sacaMrantAqviti̍# saM - carantau|̍ dUrEhEtiriti̍# dUrE - hEtiH| indriyAvAqnitI̱ndriya - vAqn| patatrI| tE| naH| agnayaH|̍ paprayaH|̍ pAqrayantu| | 33 (65)
verses.samhita: ntaramRutamaPsu̍ BEśhajamapAmuta̍ praśastiśhvaśvA̍# Bavatha vAjinaH| | vAqyur vA̱ tvAq manur̍ vA tvA gandharvAH saptaviṃśatiH|̍ tE agrE aśvamAyu~jjantE̍ asmi~jjavamA&da̍dhuH|̍ | apA̱M napAdAśuhEmanq. ya UrmiH kakudmAqn pratU̱rtir vAjasAtamastEnAqyaM̍ ~MvAjaṃ# sEt| | viśhṇOH kramO&si̍ viśhṇO̱H krAqntamasi̍ viśhṇOr vikrA̱ntamasya~gkau nya~gkA ( ) vaBitO rathaM ~Myau dhvAqntaM ~MvAtAqgramanu̍# sa~jcarantau̍ dUrEhEti-rindriyAvA̱n̍ patatrI tE nO&gnayaH paprayaH̍ pArayantu| | 33

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvasya|̍ aham| savituH| prasava iti# pra - savE| bRuhaspatinA|̍ vAqjajitEti# vAja - jitA̱| vAja̱m| jEśham| dEvasya|̍ aham| savituH| prasava iti# pra - savE| bRuhaspatinA|̍ vAqjajitEti# vAja - jitA̱| vaṛ śhiśhTham|̍ nAka̱m| ruhEyam| indrAya|̍ vAca̱m| vadata| indra̱m| vAja̱m| jAqpayata| indraH|̍ vAja̱m| ajayit| | aśvAjanItyaśva̍# - ajani| vAqjini| vAjEśhu|̍ vAqjinIvatIti# vAjinI - vati| aśvAn|̍ samathsviti# samat-sa| vAqjaya| | arvA̱| asi| saptiH|̍ asi| vAqjI| asi| vAjinaH|̍ vAja̱m| dhAqvata| marutA̱m| prasava iti# pra - savE| jayata| vIti|̍ yOjanA|̍ mimIddhvam| addhvanaH|̍ skaBnIta| 34 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasyAqhaṃ savituH̍ prasavE̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ vAjajitAq vAjaM̍ jEśhaM dEvasyAqhaṃ savituH̍ prasavE̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ vAjajitAq vaṛ śhiśhThaM̍ nAkaṃ# ruhEyamindrAya̍ vAcaM̍ ~MvadatEndraM vAjaM̍ jApayatEndrO vAjamajayit|̍ | aśvAjani̍ vAjini vAjEśhu̍ vAjinIvatyaśvA̱nth samathsu# vAjaya| | arvA&si̍ saptirasi̍ vAqjyasi̍ vAjinO̍ vAjaM̍ dhAvata marutA̱M prasavE jayata̍ vi yOjanA̍ mimIddhvamaddhvanaH̍ skaBnIta-[ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) kAśhThA̱m| gacCata| vAjEvAja̍ iti vAjE̱- vAqjE| avata| vAqjinaH| naH| dhanEśhu|̍ viprAqH| amRutAqH| RutajñAq ityRuta̍ - jñAqH| | asya| maddhvaH|̍ pibata| mAqdayaddhvam|̍ tRuptAH| yAqta| pathiBiriti# pathi - BiH| dEvayAnariti# dEva - yAnai̱H| | tE| naH| arvantaH|̍ havanaśruta iti# havana - śrutaH|̍ hava̱m| viśvE̱| śRuṇvantu| vAqjinaH|̍ | mitadrava̍ iti# mita - dravaH| sahasrasA iti# sahasra-sAH| mEdhasAqtEti# mEdha-sAqtAq| saniśhyavaH|̍ | mahaH| yE| ratna̱m| samithEśhviti# saM - ithEśhu|̍ jaBrirE| śam| naH| Bavantu| vAqjinaH|̍ havEśhu|̍ | dEvatAqtEti# dEva - tAqtAq| mitadrava̍ iti# mita - dravaH| svarkA iti# sU - arkAH| | jaBaMyantaH|̍ ahi̱m| vRuka̱m| rakśhAṃsi|̍ sanEmi|̍ asmat| yuyavann| 35 (50)
verses.samhita: kAśhThA̱M gacCata vAjEvAjE&vata̍ vAjinO nO dhanEśhu̍ viprA amRutA RutajñAH| | asya maddhvaH̍ pibata mAqdayaddhvaM̍ tRuptA yAta̍ pathiBir̍ dEvayAnai̱H| | tE nO arvantO̍ havanaśrutO havaM ~MviśvE# śRuṇvantu vAqjinaH|̍ | mitadravaH̍ sahasrasA mEdhasAtA̍ saniśhyavaH|̍ mahO yE ratnaṃ# samithEśhu# jaBrirE śannO# Bavantu vAqjinO havEśhu|̍ | dEvatAtA̍ mitadravaH̍ svarkAH| jaMBayantO&hiM ~MvRukaṃq rakśhAṃsi̍ sanE̱myasmadyuyava̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) amIvAH|̍ | EśhaH| syaH| vAqjI| kśhipaṇim| turaṇyati| grIvAyA̱m| baddhaH| apikakśha ityapi̍ - kakśhE| Aqsani|̍ | kratu̱m| dadhikrA iti# dadhi - krAH| anviti|̍ santavI̱tvaditi# saM - tavI̱tvat| pathAm| a~gkAṃsi|̍ anviti|̍ AqpanIPaṇadityA̱̍ - panIPaṇat|̍ | uta| sma| asya| dravataH|̍ turaṇyataH| parṇam| na| vEH| anviti|̍ vAqti| pragad^^rdhina iti# pra - gad^^rdhinaH|̍ | śyEnasya|̍ iva| dhrajataH|̍ a~gkasam| parIti|̍ dadhikrAv. ṇṇa iti# dadhi-krAv. ṇṇaH|̍ saha| UrjA| taritrataH|̍ | Eti|̍ mAq| vAjasya|̍ prasava iti# pra - savaH| jagamyAqt| Eti|̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI| viśvaśaBUMq̍ iti# viśva - śaBUMq| | Eti|̍ mAq| gantAqm| pitarA̱| 36 (50)

verses.padam: (Padam) samubjita̍ iti saM - ubjitaH| | tEśhA̱m| viśipriyAṇAqmiti̍ vi - śipriyAqṇAqm| iśha̱m| Urja̱m| samiti|̍ agraBIm| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| | apAm| rasa̱m| udvayasamityut̍ - vayasam| sUryaraśmimiti̍ sUrya# - raśmim| samABRutamiti̍# saM - ABRutam|̍ | apAm| rasasya|̍ yaH| rasaH|̍ tam| vaH| gRuhṇAqmI| uttamamityut̍ - tamam| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| | ayA| viśhThA iti# vi-sthAH| janayann|̍ karvarAṇi|̍ saH| hi| GRuṇiH|̍ uruH| varAya|̍ gAqtuH| | saH| prati|̍ uditi|̍ ait| dharuṇaH|̍ maddhvaH|̍ agra̱m| svAyA̱m| yat| tanuvA̱M ( )| tanUm| airayata|̍ | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE| tvAq| juśhTa̱m| gRuhṇAqmi| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE| tvAq| | 46 (63)
verses.samhita: samubjitaH|̍ tEśhAqM ~MviśipriyAṇAq-miśhamUrjaṃq̍ samagraBI-mEśha̍ tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA| | apAṃ rasamudvayasaṃq̍ sUryaraśmiṃ̍ samABRutaM|̍ apAṃ rasasya̍ yO rasastaM ~MvO# gRuhṇAmyuttamamEśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA| | ayA viśhThA janayan karvarAṇi̍ sa hi GRuṇirurur̍ varAya̍ gAqtuH| sa pratyudai̱d dharuṇO maddhvO agraṅq svAyAqM ~Myat tanuvA̱M ( ) tanUmairayata|̍ upayAqmagRuhItO&si̍ prajApatayE̍ tvAq juśhTaM̍ gRuhṇAmyEśha tE yOniH̍ prajApatayE̍ tvA| | 46

verses.padam: (Padam) anviti|̍ aha|̍ mAsA̱H| anviti|̍ it| vanAni|̍ anviti|̍ OśhadhIH|̍ anviti|̍ parvatAsaH|̍ | anviti|̍ indra̱m| rOdasI̍ iti|̍ vAqvaśAqnE iti|̍ anviti|̍ ApaH|̍ ajihata| jAyamAnam|̍ | anviti|̍ tE| dAqyi| mahE| indriyAya|̍ satrA| tE| viśva̱m| anviti|̍ vRutrahatya iti# vRutra - hatyE̱| | anviti|̍ kśhatram| anviti|̍ sahaH|̍ yajatra| indra|̍ dEvEBiH|̍ anviti|̍ tE| nRuśhahya iti# nRu - sahyE̱| | indrAqṇIm| Aqsu| nAriśhu|̍ supatnImiti# su-patnI̱m| aham| aśravam| | na| hi| asyAqH| aparam| cana| jarasA̱| 47 (50)
verses.samhita: anvaha mAsAq anvidvanAqnyanvOśhadhIranu̍ parvatAsaH|̍ anvindraṃq rOdasI̍ vAvaśAqnE anvApO# ajihata jAyamAnaM|̍ | anu# tE dAyi maha indriyAya̍# satrA tE viśvamanu# vRutrahatyE̱| anu# kśhatramanu sahO# yajatrEndra# dEvEBiranu# tE nRuśhahyE̱| | indrAqṇImAqsu nAriśhu̍ supatnI-mahama̍śravaM|̍ na hyasyA̍ aparaM cana jarasAq - [ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) maratE|̍ patiH|̍ | na| aham| indrAqṇi| rAqraṇa| saKyuH|̍ vRuśhAkapEriti̍# vRuśhA - kapEH| RutE| | yasya|̍ idam| apya̱m| haviH| priyam| dEvEśhu|̍ gacCati|̍ | yaH| jAqtaH| Eva| prathamaH| manasvAn|̍ dEvaH| dEvAn| kratunA|̍ paryaBUśhaditi̍# pari - aBUśhat|̍ | yasya|̍ śuśhmA̱t| rOdasI̍ iti|̍ aByasEtAm|̍ nRuṇaMsya|̍ mahnA| saH| janAqsaH| indraH|̍ | aiti|̍ tE| mahaH| indra| UtI| ugra| samanyava̍ iti sa - manyavaH| yat| samarantEti# saM - aranta|̍ sEnA̱H| | patAti|̍ didyut| naryasya|̍ bAqhuvOH| mA| tE| 48 (50)
verses.samhita: maratE̍ patiH|̍ | nAhamindrAṇi̍ rAraṇa saKyur̍ vRuśhAkapEṛ̍ RutE| yasyEdamapyaṃ# haviH priyaM dEvEśhu gacCati|̍ | yO jAqta Eva prathamO̍ manasvAn̍ dEvO dEvAn kratunA̍ paryaBUśhat|̍ yasya śuśhmAqdrOdasI̍ aByasEtAM̍ nRuMṇasya# mahnA sa janAsa̍ indraH|̍ | A tE# maha indrOtyu̍gra̍ samanyavO̍ yath samaranta̍ sEnA̱H| patAti̍ didyunnaryasya̍ bAhuvOr mA tE - [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) manaH|̍ viśhvadriyagiti# viśhva - driyak|̍ vIti|̍ cAqrIt| | mA| naH| marddhIH| Eti|̍ Bara| daddhi| tat| naH| prEti|̍ dAqśuśhE̱| dAtavE|̍ BUri|̍ yat| tE| | navyE̱| dEśhṇE| śastE| asminn| tE| ukthE| prEti|̍ bravAqma| vayam| indra| stuvantaH|̍ | Eti|̍ tu| Bara| mAkiH|̍ Etat| parIti|̍ sthAqt| vidma| hi| tvAq| vasupatimiti̍ vasu# - patim| vasUnAm|̍ | indra|̍ yat| tE| mAhinam|̍ datra̱m| asti|̍ asmaByamityasma - Byam| tat| haryaśvEti# hari - aśva| 49 (50)
verses.samhita: manO# viśhvadriyag vi cArIt|̍ | mA nO# marddhIrA BarA̍ daddhi tannaH pra dAqśuśhE dAtavE̍ BUri yat tE̱| navyE# dEśhṇE śastE asmin ta# ukthE pra bravAma̍ vayamindra̍ stuvantaH|̍ | A tU Bara̍ mAkirEtat̍ pari# śhThAd vidmA hi tvAq vasupatiM̍ ~MvasUnAM|̍ indra yat tE mAhinaM̍ datra-mastyasmaByaM taddharyaśva̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|̍ yandhi| | pradAqtAramiti# pra - dAqtAra̱m| havAqmahE| indra̱m| Eti|̍ haviśhA̱| vayam| | uBA| hi| hastA̱| vasunA|̍ pRuṇasva|̍ A| prEti|̍ yacCa| dakśhiṇAt|̍ Eti|̍ uta| savyAt| | pradAqtEti# pra - dAqtA| vajrI| vRuśhaBaH| turAqśhAT| śuśhmI| rAjA̱| vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA| sOmapAvEti# sOma - pAvA̱| | asminn| yajñE| barq. hiśhi|̍ Eti|̍ niśhadyEti# ni - sadya|̍ atha|̍ Bava| yajamAnAya|̍ śam| yOH| | indraH|̍ sutrAmEti# su - trAmA̱| svavAqniti sva-vAqn| avOBirityava̍H̍ - BiH| sumRuDIka iti# su - mRuDIkaH| Bavatu| viśvavEdAq̍ iti# viśva-vEdAqH| | bAdhatAm|̍ dvEśhaH|̍ aBayam|̍ kRuṇOtu| suvIryasyEti# su - vIryasya|̍ 50 (50)
verses.samhita: pra yandhi|̍ | pradAqtAraṃ# havAmaha indramA haviśhA# vayaM| uBA hi hastAq vasunA̍ pRuṇasvA && pra yacCa̍ dakśhiṇAqdOta̍ savyAt| | pradAqtA vajrI vRuśhaBastu̍rAqśhATCuśhmI̍ rAjA# vRutrahA sOmapAvA̱|̍ asmin. yajñE barq. hiśhyA niśhadyAthA# Bava yajamAnAya̍ śaM ~MyOH| | indraH̍ sutrAmAq svavAqṃq avOBiH̍ sumRuDIkO Bavatu̍ viśvavEdAH|̍ bAdhatAqM̍ dvEśhO aBayaM̍ kRuṇOtu suvIryasya̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) patayaH|̍ syAqma| | tasya|̍ vayam| sumatAviti# su-matau| yajñiyasya|̍ apIti|̍ BadrE| saumanasE| syAqma| | saH| sutrAmEti# su - trAmA̱| svavAqniti sva-vAqn| indraH|̍ asmE iti|̍ AqrAt| cit| dvEśhaH|̍ sanutaH| yuyOtu| | rEvatI̱H| naH| sadhamAda iti# sadha - mAdaH|̍ indrE̱| santu| tuvivAjAq̍ iti# tuvi - vAqjAqH| | kśhumantaH|̍ yABiH|̍ madEma|̍ | prO iti|̍ sviti|̍ asmai| purOrathamiti# puraH - ratham| indrAya|̍ śUśham| arcata| | aBIkE̱| cit| u| lOkakRuditi# lOka - kRut| sa~ggE| samathsviti# samat - su| vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA| | asmAka̱m| bOdhi| cOditA| naBantAm|̍ anyakEśhA̱m| | jyAqkAH| adhIti# ( )| dhanvasviti dhanva# - su| | 51 (51) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 13 Anuvaakams :- (pAqkayajñaṃ-saṅśravAH-parOkśha̍M-baṛ̍ hiśhO&haM-dhruvA-maganmEtyAha̍ - dEva# savita-rdEvasyAqhaM-kśhatrasyOlbaM-~MvAjasyEma-magnirEkA̱kśharEṇO-payAqmagRu̍hItO&-syanvaha̍ mAsAq-strayOdaśa)̍ KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Pancaatis :- (pAqkayajñaM-parOkśhaM-dhruvAM-~Mvi̍ sRujatE-ca̍ naH sarvavIrAqM̍ - patayaH̍ syO-maikapa~jcAqśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śeventh Prasnam :- (pAqkayajñaM-dhanvasu|̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAThE prathamakAṇDE saptamaH praśnaH samAptaH| |
verses.samhita: patayaH̍ syAma| | tasya# vayaṃ sumatau̍ yajñiyasyApi# BadrE saumanasE̍ syAma|̍ sa sutrAmAq svavAqṃq indrO# asmE AqrAccid-dvEśhaH̍ sanutar yuyOtu|̍ | rEvatI̱r naH sadhamAda indrE# santu tuvivAjAH|̍ kśhumantO yABir madEma|̍ | prOśhvasmai̍ purOrathamindrAya̍ śUśhamarcata|̍ aBIkE# cidu lOkakRuth sa~ggE samathsu# vRutrahA| asmAkaM̍ bOdhi cOditA naBantA-manyakEśhA̱M|̍ jyAqkA adhi ( ) dhanvasu|̍ | 51 praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 13 anuvAkams :- (pAqkayajñaṃ-saṅśravAH-parOkśha̍M-barq.̍ hiśhO&haM -dhruvA-maganmEtyAha̍ -dEva# savitar-dEvasyAqhaM-kśhatrasyOlaṅqM-~MvAjasyEma-magnirEkA̱kśharEṇO̍ -payAqmagRuhItO&-syanvaha̍ mAsAq-strayOdaśa|̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (pAqkayajñaM-parOkśhaM-dhruvAM-~Mvi̍ sRujatE-ca̍ naH sarvavIrAqM̍ - patayaH̍ syO-maikapa~jcAqśat|̍ ) first and last padam ff śeventh praśnam :- (pAqkayajñaM-dhanvasu|̍ )| | hari# OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇDE saptamaH praśnaH samAptaH| | ------------------------------------------------ OM namaH paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaH, śrI guruByO namaH| hariH OM| | 1. 8 prathamakAṇDE aśhamaH praśnaH - ( rAjasUyaH )
